name: part_005
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ生誕祭2022】Wonder Shower Musical !!!!【3DLIVE】 [TsRo8VuubSk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Akirose introduces a quiz for Roboco and Luna as part of the birthday celebration.
Quiz time: Roboco and Luna run around to catch letters and decipher the hidden message.
The message is revealed to be 'Goods Introduction', and Akirose prepares to present the birthday goods.
Akirose introduces the 'Rosetai Certificate & Rosetai Pin Badge BOX'.
Akirose introduces the 'Jobz Plushie' and 'Rosetai Plushie'.

subtitles.original: そんな...
subtitles.english: Well then...

subtitles.original: アキロゼからも出しちゃおうかな、クイズ！
subtitles.english: I'll give you a quiz from Akirose too!

subtitles.original: え、本当？
subtitles.english: Wait, really?

subtitles.original: 本当！二人にやっぱ汗かいてもらわないとさ、今ちょっと...
subtitles.english: Really! I need to make you two work up a sweat, right now...

subtitles.original: 困っちゃうよ。
subtitles.english: That's a problem.

subtitles.original: 動くとちょっと、トイレに行きたくなっちゃうから。
subtitles.english: If I move too much, I'll need to go to the bathroom.

subtitles.original: ダメだよ、それだけは逃さないで！
subtitles.english: No, you can't run away from that!

subtitles.original: ちゃんと探してもらわなきゃいけないからね。
subtitles.english: You have to search properly, you know.

subtitles.original: うわー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: やるの？
subtitles.english: Are we doing this?

subtitles.original: やるんだ！
subtitles.english: We're doing it!

subtitles.original: なんなの、白いの？
subtitles.english: What's with this white thing?

subtitles.original: 知らないぞ、この流れ。
subtitles.english: I don't know about this turn of events...

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行きますか！
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we go?

subtitles.original: アキロゼからの問題は、こちら！
subtitles.english: The question from Akirose is this!

subtitles.original: 問題 メッセージを読み解け！
subtitles.english: Question: Decipher the message!

subtitles.original: メッセージ？
subtitles.english: A message?

subtitles.original: これね、ルーナにいっぱい動いてほしいんだ。
subtitles.english: For this one, I want Luna to move a lot.

subtitles.original: 頑張って見つけてよ。
subtitles.english: Do your best to find it.

subtitles.original: それでは、このメッセージはみんなわかるかな？
subtitles.english: Now, can everyone figure out this message?

subtitles.original: 行くよ！用意、スタート！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Ready, start!

subtitles.original: え、何？何？
subtitles.english: Wait, what? What is it?

subtitles.original: 待って、何が書いてあるの？
subtitles.english: Wait, what does it say?

subtitles.original: 何？何が書いてあるの？
subtitles.english: What? What's written there?

subtitles.original: 待って待って、え、これ？
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, eh, this?

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！OK！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! OK!

subtitles.original: 明日も頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Do your best tomorrow too!

subtitles.original: ズズ、寝てる寝てる。
subtitles.english: Zuzu, she's sleeping, she's sleeping.

subtitles.original: 出た文字を、頑張って文章にするんだ。
subtitles.english: Try your best to turn the letters into a sentence.

subtitles.original: え、ズズ？待って何？
subtitles.english: Eh, Zuzu? Wait, what?

subtitles.original: ユーケー、何何？
subtitles.english: UK, what what?

subtitles.original: ウルトラキング？アイあった？
subtitles.english: Ultra King? Was there an 'I'?

subtitles.original: アイ・ホ、アイ・ホ・ズズ。
subtitles.english: I-HO, I-HO-ZZ.

subtitles.original: あ、わかった人？わかった人いる？
subtitles.english: Ah, anyone get it? Is there anyone who knows?

subtitles.original: はい、もう一回！もう一回行ってみましょう！
subtitles.english: Okay, one more time! Let's go one more time!

subtitles.original: 待ってちょっと、走るのが精一杯だよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, just running is all I can do!

subtitles.original: じゃあもう一回、頑張ってもらいましょう！
subtitles.english: Then one more time, let's have you do your best!

subtitles.original: 用意、スタート！
subtitles.english: Ready, start!

subtitles.original: もっとゆっくり頑張って、早くね？
subtitles.english: Try more slowly... wait, is it fast?

subtitles.original: 何の文字？ちょっと待って、マジで秘技使うわ、秘技。
subtitles.english: What letters? Wait a sec, I'm seriously gonna use a secret technique.

subtitles.original: 秘技だ！ちょっと大きくする。
subtitles.english: It's a secret technique! I'll make it a bit bigger.

subtitles.original: なんか文字言って、文字言って！
subtitles.english: Say some letters, say the letters!

subtitles.original: GU... GIU... GIUSU...
subtitles.english: GU... GIU... GIUSU...

subtitles.original: アイ・ホ、アイ... アイ・ホ...
subtitles.english: I-HO, I... I-HO...

subtitles.original: アス、UK... ちょっと引いて、引いて！
subtitles.english: AS, UK... zoom out a bit, zoom out!

subtitles.original: もっと見つけて！ワード他にもあるの？
subtitles.english: Find more! Are there other words?

subtitles.original: アメリカ、GU... グッジョブ！
subtitles.english: America, GU... Good job!

subtitles.original: UK、US！
subtitles.english: UK, US!

subtitles.original: わかんねーよ！あれ？
subtitles.english: I don't get it at all! Huh?

subtitles.original: なんか文字になってきたような... グ... グッズ？
subtitles.english: It feels like it's becoming words... Gu... Goods?

subtitles.original: グッズ... 紹介... アキロゼグッズ？
subtitles.english: Goods... Introduction... Akirose Goods?

subtitles.original: はい、こちら！正解は、こちら！
subtitles.english: Alright, here it is! The correct answer is this!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！わかるでしょう？
subtitles.english: Ta-da! You can tell, right?

subtitles.original: 見てもわかんねえよ！え、僕たち見てた文字だ、全部。
subtitles.english: I still can't tell just by looking! Oh, those are all the letters we saw.

subtitles.original: 見たけどわかんない。ちゃんと読んで、ちゃんと読んで。
subtitles.english: We saw them but didn't get it. Read it properly, read it properly.

subtitles.original: ホグユケーアイ... クイズ下手くそか！
subtitles.english: Hog-UK-AI... Are you bad at quizzes or what?!

subtitles.original: US、アイ、アイ・ホ... アイ・ズ...
subtitles.english: US, I, I-HO... I-S...

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、グッズ紹介！
subtitles.english: Yes, so the answer is, Goods Introduction!

subtitles.original: ローマ字かよ！ふざけんなよ！
subtitles.english: It was in Romaji?! Are you kidding me?!

subtitles.original: 弄ばれてるんだ、うちら。酷いよ！
subtitles.english: We're being played with. That's terrible!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、グッズ紹介をさせていただきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Yes, so with that, I'd like to do the goods introduction!

subtitles.original: おいおい、弄ばれたよ。あり得ない。酷いよ！
subtitles.english: Hey now, we were played. Unbelievable. Terrible!

subtitles.original: お祝いに来たのに、あの子に遊ばれちまったよ。
subtitles.english: We came to celebrate, but we got played by her.

subtitles.original: いい文章かと思ったのに！酷いよ！
subtitles.english: I thought it would be a nice message! Terrible!

subtitles.original: ごめんごめん、今日は誕生日ってことで、許してよ。
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, it's my birthday today, so please forgive me.

subtitles.original: 仕方ないなあ... しょうがないならね、祝うか。
subtitles.english: I guess we have no choice... Since we're here to celebrate.

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、グッズ紹介一緒にやってくれる？
subtitles.english: Then, can you help me with the goods introduction?

subtitles.original: いいよ！しょうがないな。
subtitles.english: Okay! We have no choice.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、グッズ紹介いきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Alright, so let's move on to the goods introduction!

subtitles.original: なんだなんだ？
subtitles.english: What is it, what is it?

subtitles.original: ふふふ、こちらだ！どどん！
subtitles.english: Hehehe, it's this! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: ロゼ隊証明書＆ロゼ隊ピンバッジBOX
subtitles.english: Rosetai Certificate & Rosetai Pin Badge BOX

subtitles.original: 一つ目！
subtitles.english: Number one!

subtitles.original: ロゼ隊証明書＆ロゼ隊ピンバッジBOX！
subtitles.english: Rosetai Certificate & Rosetai Pin Badge BOX!

subtitles.original: おおー！証明書とピンバッジ？
subtitles.english: Ooh! A certificate and a pin badge?

subtitles.original: これってもしかして、持ってたらロゼ隊の証明の証になっちゃうってこと？
subtitles.english: Does this mean if you have it, it becomes proof that you're a Rosetai?

subtitles.original: そういうこと！
subtitles.english: Exactly!

subtitles.original: 欲しい欲しい！
subtitles.english: I want it, I want it!

subtitles.original: こちら、安住あきたけ先生書き下ろしの、豪華なボックスとカードになってるので、楽しみに待っててください！
subtitles.english: This is a luxurious box and card set illustrated by Akitake Azumi-sensei, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 楽しみー！
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: 二つ目、どどん！
subtitles.english: Number two, ta-da!

subtitles.original: ジョブズぬいぐるみとロゼ隊ぬいぐるみ！
subtitles.english: Jobz Plushie and Rosetai Plushie!

subtitles.original: おおー！ぬいぐるみ？え、これあったらもう寂しくねえな、夜。
subtitles.english: Ooh! Plushies? If I have these, I won't be lonely at night anymore.

subtitles.original: そういうこと！抱きしめようぜ、みんなで！
subtitles.english: Exactly! Let's all cuddle them!

subtitles.original: ぎゅぎゅっとな！
subtitles.english: Give them a big squeeze!

subtitles.original: そういうこと！え、こちら花田すみれ先生にデザインしてもらいました。
subtitles.english: Exactly! These were designed by Sumire Hanada-sensei.

subtitles.original: もうめっちゃ可愛くなって、なってるので、抱きしめて眠ってくれよ。
subtitles.english: They've turned out so incredibly cute, so please sleep while cuddling them.

subtitles.original: ぎゅぎゅっとな！
subtitles.english: Give them a big squeeze!
